=== Reply to new mentor request ===

<pre>
Hi <NAME>,

Thanks for your interest in bug triage.
Please make sure to read and understand the following wiki pages.  They
will help you get started.

* http://wiki.ubuntu.com/Bugs/HowToTriage
* http://wiki.ubuntu.com/Bugs/Importance
* http://wiki.ubuntu.com/Bugs/Status

Chatting on IRC is the best (and quickest) form of
communication between bug triagers.  Please join the channel
get you assigned to a mentor.

Supplemental information
------------------------

There is more information we need from you.
Could you please provide us with the following additional information:

* What time zone do you live in?
* What times (in UTC) are you available each day?
* What are your areas of interest (e.g., Sound, Gnome, Evolution, etc)?
* What is your IRC nickname?

Thanks,
 <REPLIERS_NAME> (<FREENODE_IRC_NICKNAME> on irc.freenode.net)
